comment.author: Joseph Jr
comment.text: Anna just remember if she becomes president any woman you know could abort their baby and you would never meet that human being ðŸ˜¥

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Yup, i believe a woman's body is her right to choose!

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: That shouldn't be a political decision, it should be a medical one. Keep politicians out of my uterus.

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Women deserve rights too!! No man, no government should ever interfere!!! EVER!!!
